reviews.content: Good food and environment. Variety of BBQ seafood and meat including vegetables/salad options. Fresh fruits and juices also available.
The food is good, the atmosphere is very relaxing, the personnel is young and very friendly, gentle and good English speakers
Delicious food, reasonable prices, attentive service, enthusiastic owner, quality is what this restaurant does not have
